about_the_game:
• Players take on the role of travelers in a different world, and by sliding their fingers left and right, they embark on an adventure of life!

  • Be cautious in your decision-making and be prepared to face the consequences. In this world filled with magic, knights, and mysterious creatures, the protagonist must solve the puzzles of crossing over and survive in this unfamiliar era through wisdom and courage.

  • Resource Management: Players need to manage resources, including combat power, stamina, reputation, and money. The acquisition and use of resources will directly affect the player's survival ability and adventure progress. It is important to maintain balance, otherwise, they may fall into madness or run out of resources to use.

  • Set out, traveler! Wishing you a wonderful adventure!
detailed_description:
May the goddess guard you

Add to the wish list, please! I need it. Thank you for your support, good luck with you... ...


Rich historical heritage and cultural background

Players can find their own story and understand the twists and turns of the kingdom's long history. The integration of various cultural elements also adds a unique charm to the game world.


Vast game worlds and diverse exploration experiences

Players can freely explore this country with rich geographical environment and experience the cultural features of different regions. In various missions and events, the player's choices affect the future development of the entire world.


Discover your own hero's biography

The story of the game will revolve around multiple heroes, allowing players to participate in the dramatic course of history. At the same time, a large number of side quests can satisfy the player's desire to explore the game world.


About the Game

  • Players take on the role of travelers in a different world, and by sliding their fingers left and right, they embark on an adventure of life!

  • Be cautious in your decision-making and be prepared to face the consequences. In this world filled with magic, knights, and mysterious creatures, the protagonist must solve the puzzles of crossing over and survive in this unfamiliar era through wisdom and courage.

  • Resource Management: Players need to manage resources, including combat power, stamina, reputation, and money. The acquisition and use of resources will directly affect the player's survival ability and adventure progress. It is important to maintain balance, otherwise, they may fall into madness or run out of resources to use.

  • Set out, traveler! Wishing you a wonderful adventure!
name: 独行旅者 Solitary Traveler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: x64或x86架构
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630/ Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Is the world ravaged by demon armies, depopulated, disordered royalty, missing gods, saved or destroyed? Over to you, alien traveler ~ Meet the test of the world, start the adventure of life!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean
